title: Attack Move isn't only for marksman.
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/486f0426c7607464f563486aeca36ccf.png

This is blasphemy. It is flat-out roleism. I am a strong, independent midlaner and I use attack move JUST AS MUCH AS ANY MARKSMAN DOES.
